description:
(GPS Me ASAP is the free version of Go To Tool)
GPS Me ASAP is a webOS application for creating, sharing, managing and finding GPS locations.
***FULL VERSION SALE $2 IN US
***WATCH THE VIDEO
***LOCATIONS
-Enter any coordinates from web, tour guide, etc
-Save current location to share or return later
-Import locations: geocaches, bike trails, wineries, landmarks, etc. (*.gpx or *.loc from 'USB Drive')
***QUICK LOCATION
-Quickly save/share current location 
-Send by Email, Messaging or Twitter
-Message includes location Name, Lat., Long. and link to Google maps
***ALERTS
-Go To Dashboard shows below any app when in range of saved location
-Go To Popup shows below any app when approaching saved location
-Nearest Dashboard shows below any other app listing nearest saved location
-Dashboards and Popup include location Name, Description, Direction and Bearing
-Updated as you move
***MAP & LIST
-Several map sources (OpenStreetMap, Cloudmade, No Maps)
-Displays nearby saved locations
-Displays track as you move
-Export list of locations as GPX
-Map-only, Map & List or List-Only
-Solar compass
-Pan an area to cache map tiles on device
***GO TO
-Needle points to saved location
-AS YOU MOVE, compass dial shows North
-Distance and Name in header
-Displays Speed and Estimated Time to Arrival
-Link to Driving Directions in Maps app
-Link to Satellite View in Maps app
-Link to URL imported with location
***GEOCACHING
-Import: loads details, hint, logs from GPX
-Go To: buttons for Geocaching.com Detail and Log View
-Add Waypoint: Near button opens Geocaching.com nearest caches
-Tweet Find
***PLEASE NOTE
-GPS requires data connection for initial lock
-GPS most accurate outdoors
-Compass only works when moving with good GPS signal
